statements: SELECT * FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE id = 1;
SELECT area_name, classification_date FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE land_cover_type = 'Forest';
SELECT id, area_name, land_cover_type, accuracy FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE classification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE accuracy >= 90.00 ORDER BY classification_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, land_cover_type FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE accuracy < 80.00;
SELECT * FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE area_name = 'City A' ORDER BY classification_date DESC;
SELECT id, area_name FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE accuracy > 90;
SELECT DISTINCT area_name, land_cover_type FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE classification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT area_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM LandCoverClassificationResults GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandCoverClassificationResults WHERE land_cover_type IN ('Forest', 'Water') ORDER BY classification_date ASC, accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandCoverResults WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, classification FROM LandCoverResults WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT image_path, capture_date FROM RemoteSensingData ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT result_id, image_id, classification FROM LandCoverResults WHERE classification LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT * FROM LandCoverResults JOIN RemoteSensingData ON LandCoverResults.image_id = RemoteSensingData.image_id;
SELECT classification, confidence FROM LandCoverResults WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT image_path, capture_date FROM RemoteSensingData WHERE sensor_type = 'Lidar';
SELECT * FROM LandCoverResults JOIN RemoteSensingData ON LandCoverResults.image_id = RemoteSensingData.image_id;
SELECT classification, confidence FROM LandCoverResults WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY classification DESC;
SELECT image_path, capture_date FROM RemoteSensingData WHERE capture_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM land_cover_results WHERE id = 100
SELECT latitude, longitude, classification_result FROM land_cover_results WHERE classification_result = 'Forest'
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM land_cover_results WHERE latitude = 40.7128 AND longitude = -74.0060;
SELECT classification_result, latitude, longitude FROM land_cover_results WHERE classification_result = 'Forest' ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor' AND sensor_name LIKE '%sensor%';
SELECT analysis_id, result_description FROM analysis_results WHERE accuracy > 0.90 ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT classification_result, COUNT(*) AS count FROM land_cover_results GROUP BY classification_result HAVING count > 10;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_classification;
SELECT image_id, classification_result FROM land_cover_classification WHERE confidence > 0.5;
SELECT type_name, description FROM land_cover_types ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_resolution > 1.5 ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, accuracy, summary FROM analysis_results WHERE accuracy >= 0.8 AND summary LIKE '%accurate%';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE image_resolution > 1.5;
SELECT id, type_name, description FROM land_cover_types ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT image_name, location_coordinates FROM satellite_images WHERE image_resolution < 2.0 AND image_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, classification_result, confidence, timestamp FROM land_cover_classification WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM land_cover_classes;
SELECT class_name, class_id FROM land_cover_classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT result_id, coverage_area FROM land_cover_results WHERE coverage_area > 100;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_data WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT analysis_summary FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM land_cover_classes;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM land_cover_classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT rc.result_id, lc.class_name, rc.coverage_area FROM land_cover_results rc JOIN land_cover_classes lc ON rc.class_id = lc.class_id WHERE rc.coverage_area > 1000;
SELECT ds.source_name, COUNT(ar.analysis_id) AS num_analyses FROM data_sources ds LEFT JOIN analysis_results ar ON ds.source_id = ar.result_id GROUP BY ds.source_name HAVING num_analyses > 5;
SELECT rs.location_name, ar.analysis_date, ar.analysis_summary FROM remote_sensing_data rs JOIN analysis_results ar ON rs.data_id = ar.result_id ORDER BY ar.analysis_date ASC NULLS LAST;
